data.title: THE POSEIDON ADVENTURE, Original Vintage Disaster Movie Poster
data.meta_description: POSEIDON ADVENTURE, 1972. Original 1 Sheet (27 x 41” / 89 x 104 cm) Movie Poster with a cast of thousands including Gene Hackman, Leslie Nielson and Carol Lynley. This hugely popular blockbuster movie made in the early seventies set a new trend in disaster movies and was followed by the Towering Inferno and Earthquake. …
data.text:
POSEIDON ADVENTURE, 1972. Original 1 Sheet (27 x 41” / 89 x 104 cm) Movie Poster with a cast of thousands including Gene Hackman, Leslie Nielson and Carol Lynley. This hugely popular blockbuster movie made in the early seventies set a new trend in disaster movies and was followed by the Towering Inferno and Earthquake. “Hells upside down …at midnight on New Years Eve the S.S. Poseidon was struck by a 90 ft, tidal wave and capsized…who will survive – in one of the greatest escape adventures ever seen”.

Artist: Mort Kunstler

For the original set of 8 Lobby Cards please Click Here

Looking for a giant Six Sheet 81″x 81″ please <Contact Us> Us for details?

This poster is in very good condition though pinholes and usual color loss on the fold lines are clearly visible. By adding linen backing to the shopping cart these issues will be addressed and we will add color back for an additional $80. We linen back posters in house, please allow a week for this service to be completed. For more information on linen backing please click here.

To see a Linen Backed version of this poster we have previously sold please click here.

Condition C8 – For Sale $275

*Shipping Charges*

“Buy This Poster” button adds a $10 base charge for shipping a folded or rolled poster or $15 base charge for a Linen Backed Poster within the USA. If outside the USA, please select the appropriate surcharge to your cart. We use Priority Mail International

If you do not see your location please <CONTACT US> and we will provide a shipping quote. We combine shipping.

USA

A folded or rolled poster is $10 or $15 if Linen Backed.

CANADA

For Canada, the shipping surcharge is an additional $35 or $40 if Linen Backed.

UK/EUROPE

For UK/Europe, the shipping surcharge is an additional $50 or $55 if Linen Backed.

ASIA/AUSTRALASIA

For Asia/Australasia, the shipping surcharge is an additional $55 or $60 if Linen Backed.
